mailgun_failed_load_api_key: Spanish: Failed to load Mailgun API key.
mailgun_failed_load_domain: Spanish: Failed to load Mailgun domain.
mailgun_error_send_email: Spanish: Error in sending confirmation email, user registration failed.
confirmation_already_confirmed: Spanish: Registration has already been confirmed.
confirmation_resend_fail: Spanish: Internal server error. Failed to resend confirmation email.
item_name_exists: Spanish: An item with name '{}' already exists.
item_error_inserting: Spanish: An error occurred while inserting the item.
store_name_exists: Spanish: A store with name '{}' already exists.
store_error_inserting: Spanish: An error occurred while inserting the store.
user_username_exists: Spanish: A user with that username already exists.
user_email_exists: Spanish: A user with that email already exists.
user_not_confirmed: Spanish: You have not confirmed registration, please check your email <{}>.
user_error_creating: Spanish: Internal server error. Failed to create user.
user_registered: Spanish: Account created successfully, and email with an activation link has been sent to your email address. Please check.
